S

save(String) - Method in class stream.ChatGroup
This method saves a message in the historyFile
sendHistory(ClientThread) - Method in class stream.ChatGroup
This method sends to a newly connected client all the previous messages of the chat
sendInvite(String) - Method in class stream.ChatGroup
This method sends the information of the ChatGroup to all the Client that have been added
sendMessage() - Method in class streamudp.UDP_Client
This method sends a message in the form of a DatagramPacket through the MulticastSocket, so that other Clients receive it
sendMessage(String) - Method in class controller.Controller
Send a message written by the user in the GUI to the EchoClient.
sendMessage(String) - Method in class stream.EchoClient
Send message to the server.
